Nothing exciting (for most people) but I’ve just finally found an easy way to stop creating the useless .ds_store files on non-mac network shares so I’m putting the info here for my posterity.

http://docs.info.apple.com/article.html?artnum=301711

  1. Open the Terminal
  2. Type: defaults write com.apple.desktopservices DSDontWriteNetworkStores true
  3. Press Return
  4. Restart the computer

As found on http://www.textsnippets.com (which also may come in handy in the future)
